TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IAccIdentity

Docs.summary: The and all of its exposed members are part of a managed wrapper for the Component Object Model (COM) interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks For more information about <xref:Accessibility.IAccIdentity>, see [IAccIdentity::GetIdentityString](/windows/win32/api/oleacc/nf-oleacc-iaccidentity-getidentitystring).

MemberSignature.Value: public void GetIdentityString (uint dwIDChild, IntPtr ppIDString, out uint pdwIDStringLen);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void GetIdentityString([in]unsigned int32 dwIDChild, [out] native int ppIDString, [out] unsigned int32& pdwIDStringLen) runtime managed
Public Sub GetIdentityString (dwIDChild As UInteger, ppIDString As IntPtr, ByRef pdwIDStringLen As UInteger)
public: void GetIdentityString(System::UInt32 dwIDChild, IntPtr ppIDString, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] System::UInt32 % pdwIDStringLen);
abstract member GetIdentityString : uint32 * nativeint * uint32 -> unit

Docs.param: Specifies which child of the IAccessible object the caller wants to identify.

Address of a variable that receives a pointer to a callee-allocated identity string. The callee allocates the identity string using ; the caller must release the identity string by using when finished.
Address of a variable that receives the length, in bytes, of the callee-allocated identity string.
